cause.description:
Primary Goals
-Hold forums and seminars to spread awareness of adolescent psychological needs.
-Provide information to adolescents, schools and parents on counseling and resource availability.
-Provide access to therapist for adolescent(s) who need counseling and who might not otherwise have the financial means.
-Provide financial aid for graduate students intending to pursue a career in adolescent psychology.
-Establish a scholarship in the name of Josh Quince, to be awarded to a high school graduate who exemplifies the spirit of Josh Quince.
DEDICATED TO ENSURING THAT ADOLESCENTS OBTAIN THE SERVICES THEY NEED!
1. Depressed teens need an outlet for help before it gets too severe
2. Help prevent teenage suicide
cause.mission: The mission of the Josh Quince Foundation is to provide information and create avenues for adolescent psychological services for those individuals who would otherwise not have the financial means.
cause.name: The Josh Quince Foundation
